languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Reaper can use both Desperate Measure and Heroic Act in the same combat (but not in the same round). Using Desperate Measure increases the Reaper's Weapon Skill by 10 and Reaper's Resolve by 3.

The Bladedancer can use both a desperate measure and a heroic act in the same combat (but not in the same round). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 Weapon Skill and +3 resolve.

The Bladedancer can use both a desperate measure and a heroic act in the same combat (but not in the same round). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 Weapon Skill and +3 resolve.

The Bladedancer can use both a desperate measure and a heroic act in the same combat (but not in the same round). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 Weapon Skill and +3 resolve.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} puede usar una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g} y un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} en el mismo combate (pero no en el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}). Cada vez que el hoja danzante usa una medida desesperada, gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} puede usar una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g} y un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} en el mismo combate (pero no en el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}). Cada vez que el hoja danzante usa una medida desesperada, gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}の両方を同じ戦闘中（ただし同じ{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中ではない）を使うことができる。ブレードダンサーが非常手段を使用するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}を+10と{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を+3獲得する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}の両方を同じ戦闘中（ただし同じ{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中ではない）を使うことができる。ブレードダンサーが非常手段を使用するたび、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を+10と{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を+3獲得する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}可以在同场战斗内既使用{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}，又使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}（但两者无法在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用）。当刀锋舞者使用背水一战时，会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与+3{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}可以在同场战斗内既使用{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}，又使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}（但两者无法在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用）。当刀锋舞者使用背水一战时，会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与+3{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} peut utiliser aussi bien une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g} qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au cours d'un même combat (mais pas dans le même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Lorsque le danselame utilise une mesure désespérée, il gagne +10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} peut utiliser aussi bien une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g} qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} au cours d'un même combat (mais pas dans le même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Lorsque le danselame utilise une mesure désespérée, il gagne +10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} kann eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} und eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} im selben Kampf ausführen (aber nicht in derselben {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}). Wenn der Klingentänzer eine Verzweiflungstat ausführt, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} kann eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} und eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} im selben Kampf ausführen (aber nicht in derselben {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}). Wenn der Klingentänzer eine Verzweiflungstat ausführt, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} в одном бою может применять и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} (в разных {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундах{/g}). Прибегая к отчаянным мерам, танцор смерти получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} can use both a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} in the same combat (but not in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Whenever the Bladedancer uses a desperate measure, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

Прибегая к отчаянным мерам, танцор смерти получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} в одном бою может применять и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}, и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} (в разных {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундах{/g}). Прибегая к отчаянным мерам, танцор смерти получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
